searchConfiguration.name: Consider explicit delete when file is not needed any more
String.getBytes() is current locale-dependant, use String.getBytes(Charset) instead
searchable configurable should not contain JComponent fields
Suspicious usage of PsiUtilBase#findEditor inside quick fix, probably better idea to use LocalQuickFixAndIntentionActionOnPsiElement

constraint.name: MethodCall
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiClass import com.intellij.psi.util.InheritanceUtil import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil
PsiClass aClass = PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, PsiClass.class) aClass != null && InheritanceUtil.isInheritor(aClass, "com.intellij.codeInspection.LocalQuickFix")"

searchConfiguration.name: Potential memory leak: don't hold PsiElement inside quick fix, use SmartPsiElementPointer or instead of; also see LocalQuickFixOnPsiElement

constraint.name: Class
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiClass import com.intellij.psi.util.InheritanceUtil import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil
Object c = __context__ return c instanceof PsiClass && InheritanceUtil.isInheritor(c, "com.intellij.codeInspection.LocalQuickFix") "

constraint.name: FieldType
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiClass import com.intellij.psi.PsiElement import com.intellij.psi.PsiField import com.intellij.psi.util.InheritanceUtil import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil
PsiField f = PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, PsiField) return f != null && InheritanceUtil.isInheritor(f.getType(), "com.intellij.psi.PsiElement") "

replaceConfiguration.name: Potential non-desired escape from lambda expression
new String(byte[]) is default locale dependent; use new String(byte[], Charset) instead

searchConfiguration.name: Anonymous threads are discouraged; please supply name
Anonymous threads runnable are discouraged; please supply name
DBE model property is private (must be public)
DBE model property is package local (must be public)
DBE model property is protected (must be public)

constraint.name: __context__
__context__
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.* import com.intellij.psi.search.GlobalSearchScope import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiUtil
def stringUtil = JavaPsiFacade.getInstance(e.getProject()).findClass("com.intellij.openapi.util.text.StringUtil", GlobalSearchScope.allScope(e.getProject())); def strVirtualFile = PsiUtil.getVirtualFile(stringUtil);
e instanceof PsiLiteralExpression && e.getParent().getParent().getParent() instanceof PsiIfStatement && ((PsiIfStatement)e.getParent().getParent().getParent()).getElseBranch() == null && strVirtualFile != null && e.getResolveScope().contains(strVirtualFile)
"

constraint.name: __context__
__context__

searchConfiguration.name: anonymous Timer is discouraged, please supply name
anonymous Timer(daemon) is discouraged, please supply name

replaceConfiguration.name: "var = volatile = E" should be "volatile = var = E"

constraint.name: field
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiField import com.intellij.psi.PsiModifier import com.intellij.psi.PsiReferenceExpression import com.intellij.psi.PsiVariable
field instanceof PsiReferenceExpression && ((PsiReferenceExpression)field).resolve() instanceof PsiField && ((PsiField)((PsiReferenceExpression)field).resolve()).hasModifierProperty(PsiModifier.VOLATILE) && var instanceof PsiReferenceExpression && ((PsiReferenceExpression)var).resolve() instanceof PsiVariable && !((PsiVariable)((PsiReferenceExpression)var).resolve()).hasModifierProperty(PsiModifier.VOLATILE)"

replaceConfiguration.name: Suppressed exceptions are ignored

constraint.name: __context__
constraint.script: com.intellij.psi.PsiTryStatement ts = com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, com.intellij.psi.PsiTryStatement.class, false); return ts != null && ts.getCatchSections().length == 0

replaceConfiguration.name: anonymous scheduled thread pools are discouraged

searchConfiguration.name: SwingWorker generates too many threads; use Application.execute*() instead
remove test-only branch and use UIUtil.dispatchAllInvocationEvents in tests
remove test-only branch and use UIUtil.dispatchAllInvocationEvents in tests 2

constraint.name: __context__
__context__
